resource.chars:
23 d. October 1908
Dear Dr. Shaw 
The enclosed letter has been 
sent to me by Captain Scott, of the 
“Discovery”. It has been considered by 
the officers of the Royal Society, and we 
think that it ought in the first place 
to be submitted to you for any observations 
you may wish to make on it.
Yours truly 
Arch Geikie 
W.N. Shaw Esq
DSc. FRS.
